content.raw:
If these meshes are high-polygon then the slowdown probably happens from having a huge number of contact points being considered by the LCP solver as soon as contact is made.

I think the Bullet collision detector is supposed to be good about filtering down the contact points, but that might depend on how it’s being configured. I can look into this alongside the [plane phasing issue](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/issues/8/).
content.html:
If these meshes are high-polygon then the slowdown probably happens from having a huge number of contact points being considered by the LCP solver as soon as contact is made.

I think the Bullet collision detector is supposed to be good about filtering down the contact points, but that might depend on how it’s being configured. I can look into this alongside the plane phasing issue.
